other_tests.findings: Profound T-cell lymphopenia and no detectable TRECs.
Identified a heterozygous de novo missense mutation, p.N441K, in BCL11B.
Did not pinpoint an anomaly in DNA-repair defects.
Full T-cell engraftment with normal proliferation to phytohemagglutinin.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Engraftment has remained stable for more than 2 years.

other_tests.findings: Revealed callosal agenesis, abnormal gyri, and volume loss of white matter.
Revealed that p.N441K BCL11B impaired lymphocyte development.
